name: Forever Spaghetters
description:
Requires HTC Vive and Vive Controllers

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018 at the Sheridan College jam site.

Forever Spaghetters is everything you would hope a virtual date would be.

Eat spaghetti with your lovely date in this VR dating sim.

We also made Sound Waves in the last hour of the jam.

Made by Spicy Boys

  • Michael Brown
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Nathan Galbraith
  • Justin Sennema
  • Cass King
  • Patrick Flattery
  • Heather Snorkelhead
  • Coley Caverley
  • Caroline Vani
